notes: Mail-in and absentee ballots can be dropped off at the Elections Office (542 Forbes Avenue, 6th Floor, downtown Pittsburgh). The division is planning to have drop off in the lobby of the building on Election Day. Parking spaces will be marked on Forbes Avenue directly in front of the building for voters to just pull up outside and go into the lobby to drop off their ballot. Please note: Voters may only drop off their own ballots.
